data.name: UnoControlEditModel
desc: specifies the standard model of a UnoControlEdit.
**since**
OOo 2.3

properties.name: Align
desc: specifies the horizontal alignment of the text in the control.

properties.name: AutoHScroll
desc: If set to true an horizontal scrollbar will be added automatically when needed.
**since**
OOo 2.3

properties.name: AutoVScroll
desc: If set to true a vertical scrollbar will be added automatically when needed.
**since**
OOo 2.3

properties.name: BackgroundColor
desc: specifies the background color (RGB) of the control.

properties.name: Border
desc: specifies the border style of the control.

properties.name: BorderColor
desc: specifies the color of the border, if present
Not every border style (see Border) may support coloring. For instance, usually a border with 3D effect will ignore the BorderColor setting.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: EchoChar
desc: specifies the echo character for a password edit field.

properties.name: Enabled
desc: determines whether the control is enabled or disabled.

properties.name: FontDescriptor
desc: specifies the font attributes of the text in the control.

properties.name: FontEmphasisMark
desc: specifies the com.sun.star.text.FontEmphasis value of the text in the control.

properties.name: FontRelief
desc: specifies the com.sun.star.text.FontRelief value of the text in the control.

properties.name: HScroll
desc: specifies if the content of the control can be scrolled in the horizontal direction.

properties.name: HardLineBreaks
desc: specifies if hard line breaks will be returned in the XTextComponent.getText() method.

properties.name: HelpText
desc: specifies the help text of the control.

properties.name: HelpURL
desc: specifies the help URL of the control.

properties.name: HideInactiveSelection
desc: specifies whether the selection in the control should be hidden when the control is not active (focused).
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: LineEndFormat
desc: specifies which line end type should be used for multi line text

Controls working with this model care for this setting when the user enters text. Every line break entered into the control will be treated according to this setting, so that the Text property always contains only line ends in the format specified.
Possible values are all constants from the LineEndFormat group.

Note that this setting is usually not relevant when you set new text via the API. No matter which line end format is used in this new text then, usual control implementations should recognize all line end formats and display them properly.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: MaxTextLen
desc: specifies the maximum character count.
There's no limitation, if set to 0.

properties.name: MultiLine
desc: specifies that the control may have more than one line.

properties.name: PaintTransparent
desc: specifies whether the control paints it background or not.
**since**
OOo 2.3

properties.name: Printable
desc: specifies that the control will be printed with the document.

properties.name: ReadOnly
desc: specifies that the content of the control cannot be modified by the user.

properties.name: Tabstop
desc: specifies that the control can be reached with the TAB key.

properties.name: Text
desc: specifies the text displayed in the control.

properties.name: TextColor
desc: specifies the text color (RGB) of the control.

properties.name: TextLineColor
desc: specifies the text line color (RGB) of the control.

properties.name: VScroll
desc: specifies if the content of the control can be scrolled in the vertical direction.

properties.name: VerticalAlign
desc: specifies the vertical alignment of the text in the control.
**since**
OOo 3.3

properties.name: WritingMode
desc: denotes the writing mode used in the control, as specified in the com.sun.star.text.WritingMode2 constants group.
Only com.sun.star.text.WritingMode2.LR_TB and com.sun.star.text.WritingMode2.RL_TB are supported at the moment.
**since**
OOo 3.1
